description: A Dart source file defining a custom app theme for a Flutter application, including color schemes, style configurations, and utility gradient functions.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class encapsulating theme data and gradient helpers for the app.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured for a light, modern, blue and amber accent theme.

methods.name: backgroundGradient
methods.description: Provides a subtle gradient background matching the theme's color palette.

methods.name: radialHighlight
methods.description: Provides a radial gradient for header or hero highlights.
